text:
That's because Bayer's #chloroquine isn't approved by #FDA for any condition in the U.S. For the donated supplies of Bayer's drug to be used, it had to have an EUA, otherwise, it could not be used in the U.S. at all [Can't use a drug off label that doesn't have a label]
